title: someone from riot, please look into my account the keyfrags are buggy as hell!
body:
so far i got 11 i think... im honor lv 3 and i ONLY got them when i got 3-4 honors 2 games in a row.
i NEVER got anything so far when i didnt get a ton of honors 2-3 games in a row.
other ppl tell me they got over 50 and BARELY play more then me.

replies.body: So the key fragments drops are meant to be somewhat random and not guaranteed for getting a certain amount of honors after a match. I went ahead and looked over your hextech history just to be safe, and it does look like you've been getting the right amount of drops so far!

thanks for the effort. nice to hear! just one more question: how come other ppl (even friends of mine) legit got 30+ keyfrags while i got 11? 
one guy in my friendlist even is honor lv 1 and got 18 so far :/
